tradeCredits1.description: Contains 1 Trade Credit. Use it to trade pins with other users.

tradeCredits2.description: Contains 3 Trade Credits. Use these to trade pins with other users.

tradeCredits3.description: Contains 5 Trade Credits. Use these to trade pins with other users.

tradeCredits4.description: Contains 10 Trade Credits. Use these to trade pins with other users.

tradeCredits5.description: Contains 25 Trade Credits. Use these to trade pins with other users.

brawler.description: Randomly selects a new brawler to unlock. If all brawlers of a specific rarity are unlocked, the probability of getting a brawler of all other rarities increases.

accessory1.description: This accessory unlocks a new unit that can be used in challenges.

avatart1.description: This avatar is a reward for reaching a collection score of C. Purchase this avatar and reach a collection score of B- to purchase the next avatar in this series.

avatart2.description: This avatar is a reward for reaching a collection score of B-. Purchase this avatar and reach a collection score of B+ to purchase the next avatar in this series.

avatart3.description: This avatar is a reward for reaching a collection score of B+. Purchase this avatar and reach a collection score of A to purchase the next avatar in this series.

avatart4.description: This avatar is a reward for reaching a collection score of A. Purchase this avatar and reach a collection score of A+ to purchase the next avatar in this series.

avatart5.description: This avatar is a reward for reaching a collection score of A+. Purchase this avatar and reach a collection score of S- to purchase the next avatar in this series.

avatart6.description: This avatar is a reward for reaching a collection score of S-. Purchase this avatar and reach a collection score of S to purchase the next avatar in this series.

avatart7.description: This avatar is a reward for reaching a collection score of S. Purchase this avatar and reach a collection score of S+ to purchase the next avatar in this series.

avatart8.description: This avatar is a reward for reaching a collection score of S+. This is the final avatar in this series of collection score rewards.

avatar1.description: Contains a new avatar. This avatar can be selected in the account settings.

avatara1.description: This avatar is a reward for purchasing at least 12 different avatars.

avatara2.description: This avatar is a reward for purchasing at least 12 different themes.

avatara3.description: This avatar is a reward for collecting at least 2000 pin copies.

avatar0.description: Contains a new avatar. This avatar can be selected in the account settings.
